vision: Education is accessible to everyone, regardless of their location or circumstances. We dream of a world where the full power of technology is harnessed to unlock the limitless possibilities of education.
mission: Providing high-quality educational resources accessible to all students globally. It will focus on creating an environment that supports interactive and engaging educational experiences to solve the future learning problem by filling  the gaps between students and teachers worldwide.
history: In the bustling heart of innovation, LIP Course was born out of a vision to  make learning accessible to everyone, everywhere. Founded science 2019 by a group of passionate educators for  help university students from The Middle East as (Egypt, Kuwait, UAE, Saudi Arabia, Jordan, Qatar,........) and Europe from may University ( international, private,national) to study. LiP Courses is not just an educational platform but a beacon of progress in the lifelong learning movement.
aboutPage: LiP Courses(Learn in Peace Courses )is a pioneering educational technology Company , committed to transforming the landscape of learning and teaching through digital innovation LIP facilitates interactive learning experiences, ensuring accessibility and excellence in education globally
